ai.grakn.graql.admin

Interface Conjunction<T extends PatternAdmin>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of patterns in this conjunction
    All Superinterfaces:
    Pattern, PatternAdmin

    public interface Conjunction<T extends PatternAdmin>
extends PatternAdmin
    A class representing a conjunction (and) of patterns. All inner patterns must match in a query
    Author:
    Felix Chapman

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Get the disjunctive normal form of this pattern group.

    • Method Detail

      • getPatterns

        Set<T> getPatterns()
        Returns:
        the patterns within this conjunction

      • getDisjunctiveNormalForm

        Disjunction<Conjunction<VarAdmin>> getDisjunctiveNormalForm()
        Description copied from interface: PatternAdmin
        Get the disjunctive normal form of this pattern group. This means the pattern group will be transformed into a number of conjunctive patterns, where each is disjunct. e.g. p = (A or B) and (C or D) p.getDisjunctiveNormalForm() = (A and C) or (A and D) or (B and C) or (B and D)
        Specified by:
        getDisjunctiveNormalForm in interface PatternAdmin
        Returns:
        the pattern group in disjunctive normal form
